violations.description: Ensure the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
violations.help: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

nodes.html: <div role="contentinfo" aria-label="scroll to top container" class="scroll-to-top-container">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Document has more than one contentinfo landmark

violations.help: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

violations.description: Ensure lang attributes have valid values
violations.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Value of lang attribute not included in the list of valid languages
